metadata.title: CVE-2024-26735 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ipv6: sr: fix possible use-after-free and null-ptr-derefThe pernet operations structure for the subsystem must be registeredbefore registering the generic netlink family.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
